ygData.subject: Re: Travelling to Neriak
ygData.msgSnippet: You will be slain as soon as you enter the nektulos forsest zone.. as the guards have a very long patrol route.  I haven t found anything that raises faction
ygData.messageBody:
You will be slain as soon as you enter the nektulos forsest zone.. as the
guards have a very long patrol route. I haven't found anything that raises
faction with dark elves either.. the only chance I see is if you worship
innoruuk, a lot of times other races are not KOS'd if they worship innoruuk.
Though I'm not sure if the merchants will sell to you if you do. Basically
unless you have invis and use it the whole time you are there, you are an
enchanter who has illusion: dark elf, or you are around lvl 50 and manage to
kill all the guards I wouldn't suggest going to neriak.

Tandeyan, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: David Knight <DKnight@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 1:09 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Travelling to Neriak


>From: David Knight <DKnight@...>
>
>I'm a 10th level High-Elf Wizard wanting to travel to Neriak. Will I be
>slain on site if I go anywhere near the city? If so, is there anything I
>can do (i.e. raising faction) to allow entrance?
>
>Thanks in advance.
>
>-Angoren
>10th level Solusek Ro Server
